item.title: Upcoming speaking activities
item.description: In this blog post I want to give a short overview about my upcoming speaking activities in the rest of 2019. 04.10.2019 .NET Conf 2019 With collaborated forces of different UserGroups around Zürich we are presenting a meetup to have the .NET Conf local in Zürich. I will give a short introduction about what is new in ASP.NET Core 3.0. Meetups are usually a nice place to get started. Link: https://www.
